channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Office/WordPad
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Office/WordPad

item.title: CVE-2017-0199|2024-08-05T12:55:19.131Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- office%2Fwordpad
item.description: Microsoft Office 2007 SP3, Microsoft Office 2010 SP2, Microsoft Office 2013 SP1, Microsoft Office 2016, Microsoft Windows Vista SP2, Windows Server 2008 SP2, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted document, aka "Microsoft Office/WordPad Remote Code Execution Vulnerability w/Windows API."
